ingest_data module

ingest_data.data_modification()

Loads the housing dataset from GitHub and splits it into traning and test datasets with labels.

Returns:
housing_preparedpandas.DataFrame

Training dataframe

housing_labelspandas.Series

Training labels

X_test_preparedpandas.DataFrame

Testing dataframe

y_testpandas.Series

Testing labels

ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)

Fetches the housing.tar file from GitHub and unpacks it.

Args:
housing_urlstring

GitHub URL from where housing.tar file is downloaded.

housing_pathstring

Place where the housing.tar file is unpacked.

ingest_data.income_cat_proportions(data)
ingest_data.load_data()

Fetches the housing.tar file from GitHub and returns the housing pandas dataframe.

Returns:
pandas.DataFrame

Housing Dataframe

ingest_data.load_housing_data(housing_path)

Loads housing data to a Pandas DataFrame.

Args:
housing_pathstring

Place where the housing.tar file is unpacked.

Returns:
pandas.DataFrame

Housing Dataframe
